items.sentence: I didn\'t know that you and Tom knew each other.
I didn\'t know whether to get angry or to laugh.
I didn\'t know you were going to Boston with us.
I didn\'t realize how serious the situation was.
Tom wouldn\'t drink the cocktail I made for him.
I couldn\'t speak French when I first got there.
I didn\'t expect Tom to be able to speak French.
Tom and I are planning to go to Boston together.
Tom and I have played poker together many times.
Tom and Mary are both old enough to know better.
Tom and Mary are playing cards in the next room.
Tom and Mary are thinking about getting married.
Tom noticed Mary\'s clothes hadn\'t been washed.
I have a lot of work to clear up by the weekend.
I heard a strange noise coming from the kitchen.
I heard you were going to sell Tom your bicycle.
I helped Tom choose a birthday present for Mary.
Let me tell you about the origin of this school.
Mary is a beautiful and intelligent young woman.
Why wasn\'t the woman who attacked Tom arrested?
